scripts.test-dist: npm run dist && browser-sync start -c gulpfile.js/bs-config.js
scripts.cordovaReset: rm -rf cordova-app/plugins && rm -rf cordova-app/platforms && cd cordova-app && ../node_modules/.bin/cordova platform add android && ../node_modules/.bin/cordova platform add windows && ../node_modules/.bin/cordova platform add ios && cd .. && npm run-script dist
scripts.build-hard-android: npm run-script cordovaReset && cd cordova-app && ../node_modules/.bin/cordova build android
scripts.release-android: echo "NOTE: Must have build.json with key path and alias in your cordova-app dir. Cannot be used with Chrome remote debugging. apk will be output in cordova's android's build dir." && npm run-script dist && cd cordova-app && ../node_modules/.bin/cordova run android --release && adb logcat chromium:D SystemWebViewClient:D *:S
scripts.debug-android: echo "Navigate to chrome://inspect/devices#devices in your desktops chrome to use remote-debugging (Chrome DevTools enabled on your device)"  && npm run-script dist && cd cordova-app && ../node_modules/.bin/cordova run android --debug && adb logcat chromium:D SystemWebViewClient:D *:S
scripts.emulate-android: echo "NOTE: Must have build.json with key path, pass, alias, and aliasPass in your cordova-app dir" && npm run-script dist && cd cordova-app && ../node_modules/.bin/cordova run android --release --emulate --target=nexus4api19 && adb logcat chromium:D SystemWebViewClient:D *:S
scripts.run-android-previous: npm run-script dist && cd cordova-app && ../node_modules/.bin/cordova run android --nobuild && adb logcat chromium:D SystemWebViewClient:D *:S
